description.displayText: Gianna was so helpful caring for my two boys (13 & 7) and our dog. She is so sweet, was always on time and was able to keep my two busy the whole day! Her energy and ability to stay on top of their schedules was great. She got them outside and even walked and fed the dog. I cannot say enough good things about Gianna, she is a delight always.
description.originalText: Gianna was so helpful caring for my two boys (13 & 7) and our dog. She is so sweet, was always on time and was able to keep my two busy the whole day! Her energy and ability to stay on top of their schedules was great. She got them outside and even walked and fed the dog. I cannot say enough good things about Gianna, she is a delight always.

description.displayText: Gianna is a smart, loving, respectful young lady.  She has great family values and I would recommend her to anyone looking to hire a responsible, hardworking individual.  I would also trust her to make good decisions and be reliable.  Based on Gianna's great character and dependability, I would recommend her highly!
